thread.title: Coronation Street: Sarah to confront Nathan as he continues to groom Bethany | Metro News
thread.title_full: Coronation Street: Sarah to confront Nathan as he continues to groom Bethany | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Coronation Street: Sarah to confront Nathan as he continues to groom Bethany | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 3:45 pm (Picture: ITV) 
Sarah Platt could be on the brink of discovering the danger her teenage daughter Bethany is in when she makes plans to meet with her older boyfriend Nathan. But when Sarah comes face to face with the sinister salon owner, will he manage to convince her that his intentions are pure or will Sarah realise that Bethany is being groomed? 
Fans know that Bethany’s situation is dire, with a sexual exploitation storyline developing out of Bethany growing closer to evil Nathan. His manipulation has preyed on Bethany’s vulnerability and she believes that she is in a mutually loving relationship and is enjoying feeling like an adult, unaware of what lies around the corner. 
All Sarah knows is that Bethany has a boyfriend and she has stayed at his flat and, realising that banning Bethany from seeing him will just lead to her defying her, Sarah decides it’s time she met Nathan for herself. (Picture: ITV) 
Finding his number on Bethany’s phone, Sarah contacts him and invites him for tea and Bethany is horrified when she finds out. 
But how will Sarah respond when she meets Nathan and discovers his age – and will her suspicions about his intentions cause her concern for her daughter’s safety? 
One to watch: Friday 3rd March at 8:30pm on ITV. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
